page.title: 01LANDSCAPE GENERAL SURVEY
page.content:
The whole block is privately owned and intensively farmed with small areas of woodland and only minor roads. It is very well served with footpaths & bridleways (Approx 16Km compared with 11Km of roads). Rambling & bird watching are popular pastimes.
Land usage in order of scale:- 1) Wheat, Barley & some Oats). 2) Pasture with Sheep, Cows, Horses & Haymaking. 3) Woodland with decidious & fir trees protecting Pheasants & Partridges. 4) Oil Seed Rape. 5) Peas & broad beans (one field of each).
